1.content: Before we get to the reason you're here, let's get you settled in. Who exactly are you?
1.title: Good day

11.content: Yes; you are a boy with light brown eyes and short brown hair. And do you wish to tickle or be tickled?
11.title: Male

111.content:
So you want to tickle? Splendid. And where do you wish to go?

You could have at a member of the Loud family, Royal Woods' most eccentric bunch. No doubt their ticklishness will make them live up to their surname. If not, then maybe a female resident from outside the family would interest you more? There's no shortage of them around this relatively sleepy town and I daresay some of these people are in need of stirring. Or perhaps... whomever you're looking for isn't in Royal Woods, but in a larger part of Michigan. There are opportunities to be found in the Big City to those who would seek them out.

There's plenty of options no matter where you go. Choose whichever you like.
111.title: Tickle

1111.content: I knew you would pick that option. So which Loud would you rather tickle?
1111.title: Welcome to The Loud House

choices: Her following a bogus social media trend involving tickling.
11111.content: So you picked Lori, eh? This should be interesting. What kind of scenario did you have in mind?
11111.title: The Queen of No

choices: Tricked into participating in a Renaissance Faire (as a wrongdoer).
11112.content: Ah, so you've picked Leni. The ditzy ones tend to have the cutest laughs. Which scenario do you have in mind?
11112.title: The Cinnamon Roll

choices: An "I'm your biggest fan" scenario. (How trite)
11113.content: Yeah! You picked Luna, the one who's proud and plays it loud! Got any ideas as wild as her?
11113.title: Loudest of the Louds

choices: A new albeit unusual form of entertainment for a birthday party.
April Fool's Day prank (with the tables turned on her).
11114.content: Yeah, why not go with Luan; she loves to laugh, right? What mischief awaits her?
11114.title: One Woman Prankpocalypse

choices: It's not one of these either.
11115.content: None of them, eh? How about one of these four?
11115.title: Another Four Louds

choices: A lesson in humility for her constant gloating every time she wins.
111151.content: Going for Lynnsanity, eh? That's pretty daring, but great risk often comes with great reward. What is your plan?
111151.title: The Juggernaut

choices: Play a game of "Don't Laugh" with her. (Sigh)
An arcane ritual gone wrong... or right.
111152.content: Lucy? Not sure how you plan to get a reaction out her, much less a laugh, but knock yourself out. Do you have an idea?
111152.title: The Dark Angel

choices: You have a ticket you are willing to part with... for a price.
111153.content: So you picked Lana? You must not mind her unsavoury habits, much less her aversion to bathwater. Whatcha got in mind?
111153.title: Ms. Fix-It

choices: She blackmailed you - but you're going to doublecross her.
111154.content: So you wish to tickle Lola. Alright, but be careful: she's not as sweet as she looks. So how are going to go about it?
111154.title: Cute n' Mean

111155.content: Well, that's okay. You still have three more choices.
111155.title: The remaining trio

choices: She's a guest speaker at your college and you make an intriguing discovery...
You need her help with your homework, but she refuses.
1111551.content: So you're going with Lisa Loud as your ticklee. That's a unique challenge, to say the least. If you have a plan, make it count.
1111551.title: The Half-Pint Genius

1111552.content: Wouldn't trade 'em for the world! However, is it really Lincoln you're looking to tickle or is it his female counterpart within an alternate universe?
1111552.title: One Boy or One Girl?

choices: You're a friend hanging out with him.
He broke a ketchup pact with you without a word.
11115521.content: Alright; Lincoln it is! Like the little man himself, it pays to have a plan. How does the story begin?
11115521.title: The "Middle Man"

choices: You two are partnered up for an assignment.
You have a crush on her and you're nervous about confessing.
11115522.content:
So you're going with Linka for this one? I don't blame you. I'm sure the scenario will be just as fun as with the OG Lincoln.

Just keep in mind that there's probably more to Linka's character than just being Lincoln in a skirt. You know what I mean? Think about it.
11115522.title: The Female "Linc"

choices: She asked you to peer-review her WIP novel.
You're a friend of Lori's who popped in for a visit.
1111553.content: Ahhhhh; I figured you would pick the resident MILT (no, that's not a misspelling). Noice! But she's older than most of the characters in this interactive, so how are you going to go about this?
1111553.title: Loud Matriarch

choices: I'm afraid she's not one of these.
1112.content: Ah, the town of Royal Woods. Possessing a considerable cast of characters, you certainly won't be wanting for company. So do you have a ticklee in mind?
1112.title: Come Visit The Woods

1113.content: So instead of Royal Woods, you would rather go to Great Lakes City? Sounds like a reasonable decision. Perhaps you would like to tickle one of the city's more well-known inhabitants?
1113.title: The City of Great Lakes

112.content:
Oh; you'd rather be tickled? Can't say I blame you. So where would you like to go?

For starters you could pay one of the Louds a visit. The most exciting thing about a scenario with one of them is that every one of them will have a different approach to tickling, different tactics. But if not a Loud, then perhaps another Royal Woods citizen will "tickle" your fancy? Like the aforementioned oddballs, each and every one of these female residents possess their own motive or method for sending you up the wall. Or maybe your princess is in another town - or should I say city? In the urban jungle, any girl you meet is a wildcat, waiting to sink their proverbial claws into you.

So many ticklers from all walks of life yet they have one thing in common: you will be sharing a few laughs with whomever you choose.
112.title: Be Tickled

choices: Neither, but I believe there are more Louds
1121.content: You're either very brave or very foolish to pick this option. Or maybe you just have a favourite. Who do you want to tickle you?
1121.title: Welcome to The Mad House

choices: You lost to her in a friendly game of golf.
She's not happy you stood up one of her sisters on a date.
11211.content: That's literally her name; don't wear it out. Since you've picked Lori, tell me: how did you find yourself literally at her mercy?
11211.title: Literally Lori

choices: She accidently tickled you on a date and now it's on her mind.
You've been held captive and she was duped into tickle torturing you.
11212.content: Leni doesn't seem like the malicious type, but then there was always more to her than meets the eye. What she does is up to you, but what will make her decide to tickle you?
11212.title: Ms. Smarty Pants

choices: You get caught trying to sneak into her first real gig.
You undergo an initiation to join her band.
11213.content:
Care to see if she lives up to that title~?

What a stupid question. That's why you're here, isn't it? She's gonna strum you like a guitar and see what melodies you'll produce! Now how will she rock your world?
11213.title: Maiden of 11

choices: You made the mistake of visiting her on April Fool's Day.
You feel sad and Luan genuinely wants to make you happy again.
11214.content:
Uh-oh; you picked Luan, didn't you? She ought to be fun if not wily and unpredictable, so be careful. Whichever scenario you choose, I just know she'll leave you tickled pink.

HAHAHAHA! Get it?
11214.title: Life of the Party

choices: I'll take one of the remaining options, please.
11215.content: No problem. There's still plenty of Louds to go around - and plenty of you, it seems.
11215.title: Four down

choices: She wants to improve your endurance with an unorthodox method.
Payback for you needling her over her silly pregame rituals.
112151.content: Yeah; definitely call Lynn that if you want to get on her bad side. But then you're here because you wish to be tickled by her anyway. So how will you receive her fingers of fury?
112151.title: Snorezilla

choices: She uses you as an offering for this ritual you invented.
She notices you stuck in an air vent and investigates.
112152.content: No; not that Mistress of the Dark, I meant Lucy Loud. But who knows? Maybe she's more in tune with the dark side of humanity than she lets on. In any case, you picked her so what will she do?
112152.title: Mistress of the Dark

choices: You get stuck under Vanzilla while helping her with maintenance.
She has a crush on you, which grows when she finds out you're ticklish.
112153.content: So you want Lana to tickle you? That may require a tetanus shot prior to the experience, but I'm not a doctor so I don't care. So what mess did you get yourself into?
112153.title: Queen of Risks

choices: She catches you in her bedroom uninvited.
112154.content: I think you may have bought more than you bargain for in choosing Lola, but then I'm not the one getting tickled. Anyway, how do you end up in her iron clutches?
112154.title: Damsel of Distress

112155.content: So you'd rather be tickled by somebody with a cooler head? Well, that's good because they're all that remain. Pick a Loud.
112155.title: Three to go

choices: You've signed on to help her test an experimental ointment.
You made the mistake of tickling her in public.
1121551.content: Lisa Marie Loud: intellectually gifted beyond her years, emotionally closed off by choice, and unpredictable in nature. Perfect qualities for a ruthless tickler. And your part in her malarkey is based on which formula?
1121551.title: Cold Calculator

1121552.content: This time, the shoe is on (or off) the other foot: you're going to be tickled by the sole gendered Loud sibling. The question now is whom would you rather take your chances with as their ticklee?
1121552.title: The Man or the Wo-Man?

choices: Fantasy scenario: you cross paths with Triton a la "A Dark and Story Night".
You engage in a friendly video game competition with him.
11215521.content: Of course tickling would among Lincoln's skills, seeing as you chose him and knowing which interactive he's in. In any case, how he's going to do it really all depends on the time and place... and circumstances. What are they?
11215521.title: Jack of All Trades

choices: You mess up one of her plans accidentally and you're stuck paying for it.
11215522.content: Quite the frank name for your chosen tickler, yes? And seeing how it's Linka, there's little doubt she's as adept at tickling you as he is, if not more so, or any of the other Louds. So which ticklish situation have you gotten yourself into, my friend?
11215522.title: Female Sibling Lacking Melanin

choices: Rita invites you, her muse (of a sort), over for the afternoon.
A "work off the damage to a broken window" scenario.
1121553.content: So you've picked Rita Loud, have you? Be warned: she may have years worth of stress that she may unleash upon you, albeit playfully. Now how will this mother of eleven get to tickle you?
1121553.title: Loud Mama

1122.content: Or are you? Not all who wander are lost. Maybe you found someone to tickle you?
1122.title: Lost In The (Royal) Woods

11225.content: Perhaps you'll find her within Lori's circle of friends?
11225.title: Within Lori's Circle

112255.content: Maybe you seek more compromising situations, yes? I'm sure one of these women could help relieve you of any semblance of control.
112255.title: I smell trouble~

choices: "It's happening all over my upper body."
"It's in my feet more than anywhere."
"I can feel it in my back all the way down my legs."
1122553.content:
As you walked down the hallway, you can't help but feel nervous as well as funny. Things had been going well enough for you this morning - it didn't rain like the forecast said it would and you could enjoy walking to Royal Woods Elementary, nor were you feeling jittery or unprepared for Mrs. Johnson's test - but as soon as you stepped inside the building you began noticing it. Well, whatever it was.

For reasons you couldn't explain, you felt like you were being prodded and poked by hundred of sharp needles. It took everything you had not to draw attention to your situation, even though it was becoming increasingly difficult for you focus on anything. No need to make everyone else worry or feel as uncomfortable as you. It would be best to just tough out the class and complete the test. Of course, Mrs. Johnson noticed you fidgeting in your seat along with a clear sign of agitation written on your face as she was handing out the tests. When she asked if you were well, your initial response what that you were still a little tired but you were otherwise feeling alright. She continued to dispense test papers, although you could tell she was not satisfied with your response. About ten minutes into test time, Mrs. Johnson took notice of your discomfort and agitation once more. She had correctly deduced that you were unwell and, out of concern for your health, requested that you go to the school infirmary. Despite your insistence that you were "fine", which you weren't, Agnes would not hear of it. She said she would postpone your test until later - after you visited the school nurse - but you had to leave immediately. Out of respect for your very caring teacher, and because you didn't want to fail a test you studied your brain out for, you complied with her request - even if she kind of twisted your arm a little.

So here you are now, walking towards the school infirmary and lost in your thoughts. What exactly is wrong with you? What did you do to trigger it, or if not you then what happened to you? You aren't the most physically active kid in this neck of the woods (no pun intended) so you know it isn't a sports injury. If anything you aren't so much in pain as you're feeling...sensitive? Also, you never had a reason to visit the infirmary, much less the nurse, so what would she be like? Is she nice? Is she uptight? Can she even figure out what's wrong with you and fix it with one visit? You don't want to see any doctors if you can help it.

It seems all of those answers, or most of them, lay just beyond the door in front of you. After a moment of hesitation, you open it. The room looks about what you would expect from an infirmary, but that's not what grabs your attention. Standing beside a cupboard is a rather attractive brunette wearing red lipstick and a teal nurse's uniform tightening the lid of a medicine jar. As she finished screwing the lid back on, she notices you in the corner of eye and looks in your direction.

Greeting you with a smile she said, "Hello there. Who might you be?"

You can't help but feel a little giddy. You've only been in this woman's presence for only five seconds and you've already concluded that she's as nice as she is pretty. So you smile back and tell her your name.

"I don't think I've ever seen you before, but it's still nice to meet you. I'm Patti, the school nurse, though I think you might have guessed that already." She followed that introduction up with chuckle. "So what brings you here?"

Such a charming woman. You can't help but like her already.

"Well," you begin as you gently rub your arm, "I don't know why but ever since I got to school I've been feeling really... sensitive? It's getting been harder to deal with by the minute."

The nurse's expression turns to one of light concern. "Sensitive?" she asked, "How sensitive? Are you in any pain?"

"Not really," you say, "but it's getting harder to deal with by the minute. Even Mrs. Johnson could tell something was wrong with me."

"I see," said Patti. "Well, don't take this personally but if you're really not feeling well then you shouldn't try to hide it or pretend it's not there. I'm sure you had your reasons, but it's important to look after yourself. You're nothing if you're not healthy."

No kid likes being lectured, you included, but when Nurse Patti did it to you it didn't come off as patronizing to you at all. It sounded like genuine concern and that she was speaking from the heart - or even past experience. In any case, she was not only right but she had chosen the right profession.

"Okay, Nurse Patti. I'll remember that for the future."

Patti nodded in satisfaction and gave a tiny smile. "That's all I can ask from anyone, student or no student. So where are you feeling sensitive?"

You hesitate before telling her. "Well..."
1122553.title: Hello Nurse

1123.content: Hola! Welcome to the ever beautiful metropolis we call Detroit Great Lakes City! Here you will have many opportunities - to be tickled. Maybe the residents from the Casagrandes' apartment will be more than happy to accommodate you?
1123.title: Life In The Big City with the Casagrandes

12.content: That's right; you're a girl with dark brown eyes and long black hair tied in a braid/ponytail combination. And do you wish to tickle or be tickled?
12.title: Female

121.content:
So you wish to tickle? I thought so. And where do you wish to go?

You could have at a member of the Loud family, Royal Woods' most eccentric bunch. No doubt their ticklishness will make them live up to their surname. If not, then maybe a female resident from outside the family would interest you more? There's no shortage of them around this relatively sleepy town and I daresay some of these people are in need of stirring. Or perhaps... whomever you're looking for isn't in Royal Woods, but in a larger part of Michigan. There are opportunities to be found in the Big City to those who would seek them out.

Wherever you choose, know that you will definitely put a smile on somebody's face.
121.title: Tickle

1211.content: That's the way it always is in The Loud House - and now you're part of it. So which Loud do you want to tickle?
1211.title: Chaos With Eleven Individuals

choices: She needs your help with a social media trend on bondage.
You tickling her silly while livestreaming the whole thing.
12111.content: I can see why you want Lori. It's always fun putting the bossy ones in their place, golden hearts notwithstanding. So what's going on?
12111.title: The Loud Boss

choices: You're having a sleepover with her.
12112.content: Leni always was the sweet sister, even if she isn't the brightest bulb. It's no wonder you picked her, but for what scenario?
12112.title: The Big-Hearted

choices: You two are having a chilled jam session.
You were a big fan of hers... when she was Lulu.
12113.content:
Ah, the wild and equally chill budding rocker, Luna Loud. Excellent choice! And under what circumstances do you wish to make her sing?

I'm sorry I'm not sorry
12113.title: The Rockstar

choices: You're a fellow prankster planning quite the surprise.
You're a previous April Fools Day victim of hers.
12114.content: So you've picked Luan Loud, the resident funny girl of Royal Woods. And how will you make her laugh out loud?
12114.title: The Jokester

choices: These don't do it for me either.
12115.content: Okay, then what about one of these Louds?
12115.title: Another Loud Quartet

choices: You've been tasked by her to give a massage.
You're a rival team captain determined to make her throw a game.
121151.content: My gut told me you wanted to send LJ up the wall. Just be careful; you know how aggressive she can be. So how are you going to drive her Lynnsane?
121151.title: Ms. Track Star

choices: You know about her secret love for Princess Pony. (Hm)
You have prepared a "special coffin" for her.
121152.content:
So you intend to tickle Lucy. Okay, but I'm not sure how you'll get her to crack a smile. Is she even ticklish?

Okay, that was a stupid question - but I'm sure you know what you're doing. So what have you got?
121152.title: Ms. Doom n' Gloom

choices: She ruined your date and dress with her love of mud and garbage.
You trap her while she is fixing up something of yours.
121153.content: So you picked Franklin Avenue's resident handywoman, Lana Loud. Just mind her animals... and her funky smells. So how will you get your hands dirty?
121153.title: Grease Monkey

choices: You're a rival pageant princess.  'Nuff said.
You've been tasked with giving her a makeover, and you've had enough of her.
121154.content: I bet it'll be fun teaching Lola a lesson; her attitude makes her a shoe-in for Little Miss Ticklish. But how do you fit into all this?
121154.title: Pageant Princess

121155.content: Picky, eh? Well, all I got left are these three.
121155.title: Last three

choices: You're a victim of one of her experiments and you want payback.
1211551.content: How could a brain so big fit inside a body that small? No idea and you probably don't care anyway. So what's in store for Lisa Loud?
1211551.title: Brain Box

1211552.content: It figures you would want to tickle the lovable white-haired geek. But I have to ask: are they a boy or a girl? Won't you please tell me?
1211552.title: Man With The Plan or Queen Of The Scheme?

choices: Aftermath of a Girl Guru related incident involving you.
Fantasy scenario: you capture Ace Savvy.
12115521.content: So you picked him, did you? The supposed ladies' man? And what are the circumstances of you tickling the Man With The Plan?
12115521.title: Eagle Boy

choices: An incident involving Levi's supercharged magnet left her stuck.
A misadventure running all over town has left her worn out.
12115522.content: Who wouldn't go for that option? In any case, is there a particular scenario you have in mind for Linka?
12115522.title: Snow White

choices: An alternative punishment for her crimes a la "Rita Her Rights".
You built wooden restraining devices to impress her - and bind her.
1211553.content: She makes the rockin' world go round! But seriously, good choice. What do you have in mind for this adorable mother?
1211553.title: Fat-bottomed Girl

1212.content: So you wish to explore what the rest of Royal Woods has to offer. Ample opportunities for you to tickle, that's what. So whom will you pick?
1212.title: Come Play In The Woods

choices: As they say in Mexico, "El No-go".
1213.content: It's a big place - bigger than Royal Woods, at least - so that equates to a bigger recreation space. Well, if tickling can be called recreational. In any case, the Casagrandes' apartment is a suitable first choice. Care to pay somebody in this family a visit?
1213.title: Great Lakes, Great Lakes

122.content:
So you wish to be on the receiving end? Have it your way, tough girl. So where would you like to go?

For starters you could pay one of the Louds a visit. The most exciting thing about a scenario with one of them is that every one of them will have a different approach to tickling, different tactics. But if not a Loud, then perhaps another Royal Woods citizen will "tickle" your fancy? Like the aforementioned oddballs, each and every one of these female residents possess their own motive or method for sending you up the wall. Or maybe your princess is in another town - or should I say city? In the urban jungle, any girl you meet is a wildcat, waiting to sink their proverbial claws into you.

Regardless of the tickler you pick, one thing is certain: you will be tickled pink by the end (interpret that however you wish).
122.title: Be Tickled

choices: These four won't make me Loud enough.
1221.content: I mean, you're already halfway there to becoming an honorary Loud Sister. So which one of them would you want as your tickler?
1221.title: It's a Loud, Loud, Loud, Loud World

choices: You uploaded a hilarious video about her flatulence problem online.
She got tired of you hitting on Bobby. (Shameless hussy!)
12211.content: You're really asking for it if you plan on calling her that. But then, of course, you chose Lori to tickle you. So how did you literally end up in her grasp?
12211.title: Miss Toots-A-Lot

choices: She tries to fit you with a new wardrobe when she discovers your ticklishness.
You, as her long-time friend, ask her to tickle you.
12212.content: So you've picked Leni hoping she'll be more gentle than the others? She might go easier on you, but you can never truly tell what goes on in her head. Beware the nice ones, as the saying goes. In any case, in which scenario does she fit?
12212.title: Ditzy Fashionista

choices: Pure Luna: she decides to help you sing better by tickling you.
You accidentally break her guitar and she's understandably pissed.
12213.content:
You have chosen the rockin' Luna Loud. But for this tour, you will be the one hitting the high notes with your built-in amplifier.

Just don't refer to her as a "tart". Chill she may be, but docile she ain't. Anyway, how is she going to make you sing?
12213.title: Rock-Tart

choices: Fantasy scenario: you, a villain, run afoul of The Joker.
She (and perhaps Benny) wants you to be in a tickle skit.
12214.content:
Luan as your tickler? Well, she's gonna make you laugh whether you want it or not. Question is: how does she plan to do so?

Author's Note: I assume you're smart enough to realize I wasn't referring to that Joker, right?
12214.title: Crazy Comedian

choices: Who were the remaining choices again?
12215.content: Very well. Maybe you'd rather be tickled by one of these four other Louds?
12215.title: Four Louds, one outcome

choices: Your team won the championship; LJ is being a bad sport. (Again)
122151.content: She lives up to her name in the wide world of sports, and now we shall see how well it holds up in tickling. So how will you end up on the receiving end?
122151.title: Lunatic Lynn

choices: She has prepared a special coffin for you.
Fantasy scenario: testing a voodoo doll she made in your likeness.
122152.content: You want Lucy to tickle you? I'm not sure if she even finds that sort of thing appealing, but then nobody knows everything she's hidden underneath those bangs. But in the end, the one who decides your fate is you. She's just the instrument.
122152.title: Spooky Sis

choices: Lana gets fed up with you mocking her habits and way of life.
You're part of a bogus Bluebell Scout initiation Lola concocted.
122153.content: Lana it is, then. I just hope, for your sake, that her hands are clean when she starts wiggling them around on your skin. Anyway, what happens?
122153.title: Mudzilla

choices: You're a strong rival and she wants you to drop out of the upcoming pageant.
You, her indentured servant, disobeyed her order and now you're paying for it.
122154.content: Oh boy; you picked Lola for this one. I have little doubt that her little nails are as sharp as her tongue, even if you try to remain on her good side. But how did you get on her bad side?
122154.title: Sunshine

122155.content: For someone who is going to be tickled by a Loud, you're pretty choosy. In any case, here are the remaining three.
122155.title: Three's a crowd.  What's left of it, at least.

choices: You're a spy trying to steal her latest invention.
You're a test subject for her study on knismesis and gargalesis.
1221551.content: It's never a good idea to run afoul of a mad scientist, and if said mad scientist has tickling on the brain, you're in trouble. But that clearly doesn't scare you. So what variables got you into this mess?
1221551.title: The Mad Scientist

1221552.content: Those are essentially your two options, but which of these two protagonists is the better alternative? Whether they're gentle or ruthless in their tickling remains to be seen.
1221552.title: M/F or F/F?

choices: As Ace Savvy, he interrogates you to help solve a mystery.
He wants to tickle you - with your permission. (It's a date)
12215521.content: I see you decided to stick with Lincoln. While he might not seem like the vengeful type, I'm sure he can make for it with ingenuity and inventiveness. I guess it all depends on which scenario you choose.
12215521.title: Mr. Mature

choices: You two are locked in the school basement for the weekend and she gets bored.
She decides to teach you a lesson for bullying her younger brothers.
12215522.content: So you went for Linka instead? I thought you would. However, your chances of her going easy on you are about the same as if you picked the other white-haired kid. What will she do? Pick a scenario and see what happens.
12215522.title: Agent Loud

choices: You're a tutor who is a supposedly bad influence on Lincoln.
Genderbent: You're dating her son Loni and she wants to test your "character".
1221553.content: I have no doubt Rita has years of experience as a tickler. However, you are not one of her daughters so she probably won't go easy on you. So who are you, then?
1221553.title: Mama Bear

1222.content: Oh god, I'm turning into Luan. That's what I get for seeking mileage. Anyway, blah blah blah; pick your tickler.
1222.title: In This Neck Of The (Royal) Woods

1223.content: Since you've chosen Great Lakes City over the town of Royal Woods, that means you belong to it just as it belongs to you. And while we're still on the subject of possession, do you belong to one of the Casagrandes or to another tickler?
1223.title: I Love GLC

info.brief_description: Either tickle or be tickled by a female Loud House character.  Pretty self-explanatory.
info.description:
It seems "Tickle Fever" has struck Royal Woods, Michigan - and you are in the midst of it.*

But yeah; the premise of this interactive is pretty straightforward: you can choose to be male or female and to either tickle or be tickled by female characters from The Loud House, especially those from the loudest family in this otherwise quiet town. There's not much else to say except the following guidelines.

RULES
1. Try not to veer too far away from the tickling aspect of this interactive.
2. No nudity - except for comical purposes.
3. No sex.
4. No short/troll/zero effort chapters. I shouldn't have to include this rule, but it's there.
5. Please proofread before submitting something (because I do read this stuff). I don't mind helping out, but if I have to rewrite a whole chapter then I'll just delete the addition. That's me being nice.
6. Use 2nd person perspective in your writing, seeing how your character is a POV avatar and all that.
7. Female characters only. Lincoln is the one exception to the rule (he's girly enough ) although you may choose his genderbent counterpart, Linka, if you wish. I'm not including Lily as an option for obvious reasons.
8. Have fun.

*This part is not meant to be taken literally; it's just a figure of speech. Or is it?

UPDATE: It has occurred to me that this interactive is almost a month old now and nearly 700 views within that time. I have to say I'm both surprised and amused by this turn of events. I mean, all I've done so far is write stupid selection chapters and scenario set-ups for our main characters, the Louds (and do one actual chapter). I admit that coming up with concepts for Loud scenarios took even longer than I had intended, but I hope to make up for it in substance. The following screenshot pretty much sums up the creative process of the whole thing. That and my unforgiving schedule.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/theloudhouse/images/b/be/Animatorcommentary....

Also. I didn't realize there were this many LH fans hiding out in this place. Hopefully, I (and perhaps anyone reading this) will be able to add more to this thing in the future and watch it grow even further. And remember: if you don't like the scenarios I've come up with, feel free to come with your own. That's why I've given you the option. Anyway, that's it. Cheers and stay loud!
